name: Turrican II AGA
overview: An MS-DOS to Amiga conversion of the classic action shooter game Turrican II that supports AGA graphics. The second game in the Turrican series, which was originally developed by Factor 5 in the 90's and released on the Amiga, C64, CDTV, Atari ST, Amstrad CPC and ZX Spectrum, and later for DOS. While the game is basically the same as the Amiga version we know and love still to this day, it now features more colors and higher details throughout, improved controls for joypads, bug fixes and improvements, a new intro scene, more worlds to play through(still wip), as well as the choice of the updated PC sprite, or the original from the Amiga.
